tasks.task: Demonstrating pruning techniques for fruit trees during winter dormancy.
subtasks: Showing form and structure of cherry trees, including pruning back to encourage branching.
Discussing the espalier technique, highlighting proper form and addressing challenges with mature trees.
Demonstrating grapevine pruning, emphasizing the importance of waiting until near bud break.
Highlighting apple tree pruning considerations, such as denseness and training for height control.
Covering plum tree espalier training, demonstrating proper bending and attachment to wire.
Addressing common mistakes in stone fruit pruning, emphasizing removal of vigorous, non-fruiting shoots.
Discussing the timing and method for pruning apricot trees, emphasizing fruiting on terminal buds.
Subtasks provided per task (MAINTASK -> list of SUBTASKs)

tasks.task: for each task and give subtasks. So perhaps 1 maintask per example (each tree or technique), with subtasks under each.
Demonstrating winter pruning techniques for fruit trees
subtasks: Cherry tree pruning (showing form, bud break, promoting fruiting spurs)
Apple tree pruning (discussing height control vs winter pruning)
Discussing timing and effects of winter pruning (promoting growth vs fruiting)

tasks.task: Showing espalier pruning techniques
subtasks: Peach tree espalier (three-tier structure, pruning to maintain shape)
Plum tree espalier (training on wire, tying shoots downward)
Common problems with espaliered trees (shading, dead wood)

tasks.task: Covering summer pruning techniques (though not detailed in this video)
subtasks: Reasons to do summer pruning (disease pressure, size control)
How summer pruning affects fruiting (encouraging flower and spurs)

tasks.task: Discussing grapevine pruning
subtasks: When to prune grapes (wait until before bud break)
How to prune grapes (spur cutting to one or two buds)

tasks.task: Sharing common pruning mistakes
subtasks: Lanky, weak branches in apples (not enough winter pruning)
Vigorous growth from winter pruning (excessively thinned cherry tree branches)
Fruit buds vs. non-fruiting shoots (using examples from apricot tree)

tasks.task: Demonstrating winter pruning techniques and their effects on fruit trees
Demonstrating espalier and cordon pruning techniques
Pruning cherry trees
Espalier pruning of peach trees
Demonstrating winter pruning techniques
Showing espalier and cordon pruning

Demonstrating winter pruning techniques for fruit trees
subtasks: Showing pruning of cherry trees to promote branching and fruiting spurs.
Discussing the effect of winter pruning on tree vigor and form.
Explaining the difference between winter and summer pruning and their respective effects (promote growth vs. fruiting).

tasks.task: Showing espalier pruning techniques
subtasks: Demonstrating the three-tier structure of espalier peach trees.
Illustrating proper cordon training and tying shoots downward for plum trees.
Addressing common mistakes in espalier pruning (e.g., shading, dead branches).

subtasks: Showing pruning of cherry trees to promote branching and fruiting spurs.
